short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts Piazza.com in dark mode to save your eyes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a student who is annoyed that Piazza has no dark mode option? If so, then this extension is for you! Piazza Dark Mode adds a dark mode feature to the following Piazza.com pages:
- Q&A page
- Resources page
- Statistics page
- User settings page

You can switch between light and dark mode with one click using the sun/moon icon near the top right corner. The extension will remember the mode you selected.
